newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: NZ Post seven year bonds priced at 8.59 percent.
newsitem.headline: NZ Post seven year bonds priced at 8.59 percent.

text.p: A NZ$70 million issue of eight percent April 15, 2004 bonds by state-owned New Zealand Post was priced at 8.59 percent, lead manager Bank of New Zealand said on Wednesday.
The issue was priced at a fixed re-offer margin of 0.57 percent over government 4/2004 bonds, which were priced at 8.02 percent at 11.00 a.m. at the rate set.
Co-managers of the issue are Credit Suisse First Boston and the National Bank of New Zealand Ltd.
The bonds are rated AA+ by Standard and Poor's.
